mention.text: an unusual communique signed by pablo escobar gaviria
tiempo newspaper director hernando santos castillo
those who told on gonzalo rodriguez gacha
the members of the cali cartel
a member of the cali cartel whose alias is `` the navigator , '' of denouncing rodriguez gacha and collecting the reward
